alert.note: Alert for Carver (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:16PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hennepin and east central Carver Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 416 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Independence, or 14 miles southeast of Buffalo, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Maple Plain around 420 PM CDT. Minnetrista around 425 PM CDT. Mound and Orono around 430 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Victoria, Wayzata, Chaska, Chanhassen, Excelsior and Minnetonka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for east central Minnesota.
